verses.name: Genesis 43:20
verses.text: And said, O sir, we came indeed down at the first time to buy food:

verses.name: Genesis 43:21
verses.text: And it came to pass, when we came to the inn, that we opened our sacks, and, behold, every man’s money was in the mouth of his sack, our money in full weight: and we have brought it again in our hand.

verses.name: Genesis 43:22
verses.text: And other money have we brought down in our hands to buy food: we cannot tell who put our money in our sacks.
